== Marius Gedminas ==

Linux user since 1998.  Debian user since 2001.  Ubuntu user since Ubuntu 4.10.  GNOME Shell user since Ubuntu 11.10.  Ubuntu GNOME user since it was called the Ubuntu GNOME Remix.

Python programmer, with some C++ background in the mists of 1998--2002.  Knows a thing or two about building Debian packages.  Maintainer of <nowiki>[[http://mg.pov.lt/gtimelog|GTimeLog]]</nowiki> and a few other insignificant open source packages.

''mgedmin'' on IRC

https://gedmin.as/
